summary: After the birth of his first child, Roberto, a young Mexican man slips across the border into the United States. Seeking work to support his family back home, he finds that working hard is not enough.
cast: Domingo Ambriz|Trinidad Silva|Linda Gillen|Ned Beatty|Jerry Hardin|Julius Harris|Ludevina Mendez Salazar|Maria Guadalupe Chavez|Rafaela Cervantes de Gomez|Feliz Cedano|Edward Lopez|Evelyn Chieko Saito|Tom Tar|Gabriel Segura|Paul Berrones|George Smith|Dennis Harris|Edward James Olmos|Mark Herder|Maria Elena Delgado|J.D. Hurt|Salvador Martinez|Maurice Green|R.L. Dick Rautenberg|Kent Rautenberg|Félix José Álvarez|John Sandoval|Alfred Alvernaz|Constantine Copulos|J.C. Lamont|Thomas Coffman|Virginia Bachicha|Armandina Ramirez|Lily Álvarez
title: Alambrista!
